Articles.Content:

inserts the entire country of Canada.

Inserts a gas can.

Inserts CO2 urgently.

Gets C01 (Carbon Monoxide)

Inserts Oxygen.

After some deliberation, the machine spits out a flaming diamond.

Inserts iron-nickel meteorite.

\*shoots out meteorite [snip]\* ooof

inserts cheeseburger
